Title: Blue Cat
Writer: Bill Dubuque (teleplay by), Bill Dubuque (story by), Mark Williams (story by), Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman (story editor), Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: In the Ozarks, Marty struggles to find a local business he can use for money laundering, while his kids make new friends but neglect a crucial duty.
